title: Leaflet + markercluster dependencies may dominate map chunk size

performance_details.current_metric: Leaflet/markercluster dependencies can add a large chunk to the map route bundle.
performance_details.expected_improvement: Smaller map chunk by tree-shaking or splitting CSS/assets.

optimization.description: Audit map chunk size and consider code-splitting CSS/assets or using a lighter map implementation.
verification: Analyze map route chunk via bundle analyzer

evidence: Leaflet and markercluster are dependencies and MeetingMap imports leaflet CSS and clustering.
notes: Needs bundle analyzer to confirm chunk contribution.

title: High Framer Motion usage across journal/notebook components may increase main-thread work

performance_details.current_metric: Multiple motion components may add animation and layout cost on lower-end devices.
performance_details.expected_improvement: Reduce paint/layout work by trimming animation count or prefers-reduced-motion handling.

optimization.description: Profile animation-heavy routes and disable non-critical animations for reduced-motion or low-power mode.

evidence: Several journal/notebook components import framer-motion for animations.
